ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think it blocks them.  But DS is pretty insignificant.  By that I mean during those 3 minutes of Puretone, 1 rogue would have doubled (or more) the
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think it blocks them. But DS is pretty insignificant. By that
I mean during those 3 minutes of Puretone, 1 rogue would have doubled
(or more) the damage of the DS you created. Overall if the whole raid
is DS'd, like with the diamonds, it is free damage. If a bard is
singing DS, they are not singing something else (yes I would be singing
Rondo too of course for the DS and ATK with epic), and again if they lag
or die the DS is gone. Sure the intent is to keep that rogue or that
bard alive, if the rogue dies he is doing no damage. But all things
being equal, if you do keep both alive, the rogue has doubled or tripled
the damage the bard contributed with DS.

I understand you will not always have the equipment or people you want
or need, I am just talking best case scenario, the most efficient way to
kill what you are after.

Shaisi

-----Original Message-----
From: blitz_krieg@... [mailto:blitz_krieg@...]
Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 10:03 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Be very afraid....

BTW, does the VP Mage Staff block Rondo or Psalms? If not, isn't
more DS always better??

Dark
